name: Crazy Rush 3D - Car Racing
description:
Crazy Rush 3D is the modern racing game will delight you with realistic behavior of cars on the city track and a system of damage.
Get ready for the high-octane car stunt action! Drive and smash to win the chase and become the race master!

The longer you last, the longer you have a chance to escape the chase!

Features:
- Impossible stunts - play on high speed racing action, jump throw springboards and try differrent stunt types. Challenge the chase!
- Different racing cars - in this 3D car racing game, you will have the choice to choose between amazing racing cars.
- Destructible environment - destruction has never felt so real as you see environment pieces smash of your car.
- Need for Drift - drift your cars, any time, any race!
- Car tuning - upgrade your cars to prepare for any hurdle coming your way. You can upgrade performance parts and fit your vehicle with new settings and handling parts. This will help to win the chase!

Join the fun car chase!
Feel a realistic smash car and racing experience with a single tap of your smartphone.
Get ready for the car stunt actions in Crazy Rush 3D! Drive and smash to win the chase and become the race master!
